price: そして真の、死の苦悶が到来した。（人間よ、）それはあなたが逃げていたもの。
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ سَكۡرَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنۡهُ تَحِيدُ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wajāat sakratu al-mawti bil-ḥaqi dhālika mā kunta min'hu taḥīdu
